meanings.definition: A substance used to kill mollusks.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed molluscicides on the garden to protect the plants.
meanings.sent2: The environmentalist researched the impact of molluscicides on aquatic ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous snail played a prank by switching the molluscicides with sugar.
meanings.sent4: The molluscicides acted like a silent assassin, wiping out the snail population overnight.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of the molluscicides made it easy to spot in the garden.

meanings.definition: The act of using chemicals to control mollusk populations.
meanings.sent1: The government implemented a program of molluscicides to manage the snail infestation.
meanings.sent2: The research team studied the effectiveness of different molluscicides on reducing snail numbers.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about a superhero whose power was controlling molluscicides.
meanings.sent4: The molluscicides strategy was like a chess game, strategically placing the chemicals to outsmart the snails.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the molluscicides lingered in the air, a reminder of the battle against the snails.
